verses.verse: Brethren <WG80>, if <WG1437> <WG2532> a man <WG444> be overtaken <WG4301> <WG5686> in <WG1722> a <WG5100> fault <WG3900>, ye <WG5210> which <WG3588> are spiritual <WG4152>, restore <WG2675> <WG5720> such an one <WG5108> in <WG1722> the spirit <WG4151> of meekness <WG4236>; considering <WG4648> <WG5723> thyself <WG4572>, lest <WG3361> thou <WG4771> also <WG2532> be tempted <WG3985> <WG5686>.
Bear ye <WG941> <WG5720> one another's <WG240> burdens <WG922>, and <WG2532> so <WG3779> fulfil <WG378> <WG5657> the Torah <WG3551> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

For <WG1063> if a man <WG1536> think himself <WG1380> <WG5719> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> something <WG5100>, when he is <WG5607> <WG5752> nothing <WG3367>, he deceiveth <WG5422> <WG5719> himself <WG1438>.

For <WG1063> every man <WG1538> shall bear <WG941> <WG5692> his own <WG2398> burden <WG5413>.

Be <WG4105> not <WG3361> deceived <WG4105> <WG5744>; 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG3456> not <WG3756> mocked <WG3456> <WG5743>: for <WG1063> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> a man <WG444> soweth <WG4687> <WG5725>, that <WG5124> shall he <WG2325> also <WG2532> reap <WG2325> <WG5692>.

For <WG3754> he that soweth <WG4687> <WG5723> to <WG1519> his <WG1438> flesh <WG4561> shall <WG2325> of <WG1537> the flesh <WG4561> reap <WG2325> <WG5692> corruption <WG5356>; but <WG1161> he that soweth <WG4687> <WG5723> to <WG1519> the Spirit <WG4151> shall <WG2325> of <WG1537> the Spirit <WG4151> reap <WG2325> <WG5692> life <WG2222> everlasting <WG166>.

As <WG5613> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> therefore <WG686> <WG3767> opportunity <WG2540>, let us do <WG2038> <WG5741> good <WG18> unto <WG4314> all <WG3956> men, especially <WG1161> <WG3122> unto <WG4314> them who are of the household <WG3609> of faith <WG4102>.
Ye see <WG1492> <WG5628> how large <WG4080> a letter <WG1121> I have written <WG1125> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213> with mine own <WG1699> hand <WG5495>.

As many as <WG3745> desire <WG2309> <WG5719> to make a fair shew <WG2146> <WG5658> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, they <WG3778> constrain <WG315> <WG5719> you <WG5209> to be circumcised <WG4059> <WG5745>; only <WG3440> lest <WG3363> they should suffer persecution <WG1377> <WG5747> for the execution stake <WG4716> of Moshiach <WG5547>.
